title: Web-Based Science Leadership Program for Lifelong Learning: Elementary Administrator Competency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Web-Based Lifelong Learning Model for Corporate Elementary Education Managers/Leaders. Building Blended Learning Environments Using Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners independently develop three or more types of elementary science educational materials using a web-based platform.
Learners conduct five or more feedback sessions with peer administrators using online collaboration tools.
Learners apply a web-based learning model to elementary education programs within an organization, achieving participant satisfaction rates of 80% or higher.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
